verse: दामोदर गुणमंदिर सुंदरवदनारविन्द गोविन्द । भवजलधिमथनमन्दर परमं दरमपनयत्वं मे ॥
meaning: O Govinda, with a beautiful face like the moon, the abode of virtues, the temple of grace, May you, the remover of the ocean of samsara, take me to your supreme abode.

terms.गोविन्द: Govinda, a name of Lord Krishna
terms.भवजलधिमथन: remover of the ocean of samsara
